posts.message: SA ALL, i need to contact with someone have good knowledge with OpenCV.

Guys, I'm starting a hobby project in C++ that will runs in *nix environment. It's merely calling a set of standard REST web services in a large scale, so I'm looking for the most lightweight, performant, and uncluttered way of doing it. My current options are:

1. Visual Studio as an IDE (productive), KDevelop and CMake to generate linux native executable (the most appealing option until now)

2.  C++.NET and Mono. It unlock the power of .NET, yet still concerned about performance and Mono support on the long run 

What you think?
